Class DownloadNewGOAFiles

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This program will download new gene association files. It will check the already existing editions in the species directory and download new ones if available
        Parameters:
        args -

      • updateSpecies

        public java.lang.Integer updateSpecies(java.lang.String species)
        This function will try to download the new GOA files
        Parameters:
        species - Species to update
        Returns:
        The number of the new edition (if new data was downloaded) or -1 of nothing is updated

      • queryServerForGOAfiles

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryServerForGOAfiles(java.lang.String species,
                                                                          java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> existingFiles,
                                                                          java.lang.String domain,
                                                                          java.lang.String remotedir,
                                                                          java.lang.String filewildcard,
                                                                          java.lang.Integer maxEdition,
                                                                          java.lang.String flydate,
                                                                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> newdata)
        Depending on the species this function query the ftp server looking for new files
        Parameters:
        species - Species to update
        existingFiles - Files that are already in the local system
        domain - FTP domain
        remotedir - FTP remote dir
        filewildcard - File wildcard
        maxEdition - Max edition number in the system
        flydate -
        newdata - files that are updated
        Returns:

      • downloadThisYeastFile

        public java.lang.Boolean downloadThisYeastFile(java.lang.String date,
                                      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> datesInLocalSystem)
        This function validates if a date is after the maximum date of a list of dates. For yeast edition2dates have the relationship of which files and dates are already in the system. If a provided date is bigger than the files in the system, this function returns true, false otherwise
        Parameters:
        date - Date that will be validated
        datesInLocalSystem - List of dates in the system
        Returns:
        True if date is after the max date in datesInLocalSystem

      • updateEdition2Dates

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> updateEdition2Dates(java.lang.String species,
                                                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> newdata)
        This function updates the edtion2dates file using the information in newdata and the existing information in the file
        Parameters:
        species -
        newdata -
        Returns:

      • updateTermdb

        public void updateTermdb(java.lang.String directory)
        Downloads new termb files
        Parameters:
        directory - remote directory

      • downloadUsingHttpClient

        public java.lang.String downloadUsingHttpClient(java.lang.String url,
                                       java.lang.String ouputfile)
        Download a file from a web page using an http request
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the file
        ouputfile - Where it's going to be stored locally
        Returns:
        null if there is no more data in the server, empty string if the file couldn't be downloaded returns the last modified date if the file could be downloaded

      • renameEcoliFiles

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> renameEcoliFiles(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> edition2dates)
        For ecoli a set of ecocyc files are downloaded, this function will rename that files to gene_association.goa_ecoli.*
        Parameters:
        edition2dates - Map of goa file to a date of the downloaded files
        Returns:
        Map of new goa name to a date
